nodes.bodyText: returns boolean, should we log when delete fails?
I can add a log for it if it is necessary but I should also add a check to make sure there is even a split file to begin with... I will add that.

We could wrap this and put the unreserve call in the finally block.
I will make a new pull request with these changes
